footer.description: I am a data science graduate student at The Roux Institute, Northeastern University's campus in Portland, ME. I am seeking full-time opportunities starting in late spring 2024. To get a sense of my project experience and skills, please refer to my GitHub profile. For a broader sense of my professional experience, connect with me on LinkedIn.
